tool_description: API that grabs news sources about stocks from around the world.
name: Stock News
title: Stock News

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source
api_list.description: Lists articles from specific news source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stock-news5.p.rapidapi.com/news/fox"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stock-news5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stock-news5.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stock-news5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Stock News
api_list.description: Lists all articles from all sources
